amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that reauthorizing the Land and Water Conservation Fund should be a priority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 246, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 42.

action.text: Amendment SA 246 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S536-537; text: CR S536) To express the sense of Congress that reauthorizing the Land and Water Conservation Fund should be a priority.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 246, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 42.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 246, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 42.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 246 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2.
